name: Slow Cooker Salisbury Steak
author: TESS
summary: This recipe goes together quickly and does not need a lot of time in the slow cooker.  It's a delicious way to add flavor to ground beef and the children love it! The gravy is delightful served over mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
½ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, onion soup mix, bread crumbs, and milk using your hands
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Dredge the patties in flour just to coat, and quickly brown on both sides in the hot skillet
Place browned patties into the slow cooker stacking alternately like a pyramid
In a medium bowl, mix together the cream of chicken soup, au jus mix, and water
Cook on the Low setting for 4 or 5 hours, until ground beef is well done
